name: Discover & Go Museum Passes
description: Free/discounted museum tickets and passes via library-partner access
fullDescription: Discover & Go connects library cardholders with free and discounted admission to California museums, zoos, aquariums, and cultural institutions.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free or reduced admission to many cultural institutions
- Museums, zoos, aquariums, gardens, and more
- Passes cover varying group sizes
- Available at participating libraries statewide
- New passes released regularly
howToGetIt:
1. Check if your library participates at discoverandgo.org
2. Log in with your library card
3. Browse available passes
4. Reserve a pass for your preferred date
5. Print or save pass to mobile device
6. Present pass at venue for entry
keywords: Discover & Go, museum pass, free admission, zoo, aquarium, garden, cultural institution, library pass, discounted tickets
